item.title: Minecraft Fabric Modding Toturial #1 Setup a Development Environment
item.description: Install JDK Since the latest(1.20.6) Minecraft only supports JDK21, so we need to install JDK21, here I choose to download Libreica OpenJDK 21. Choose Full JDK and click the file with the suffix msi to download if you are using Windows, double-click to install after downloading. Install Intellij IDEA Here I choose to download Intellij IDEA Community, choose the Community version. Double-click to install after downloading if you are using Windows.
